briefdescription.para: Define a special option that matches the command name only (no flags).
Define an option that triggers when input is provided with no flags.

memberdef.name: WSH_SHELL_OPT_HELP
memberdef.initializer: WSH_SHELL_OPTION_HELP, WSH_SHELL_OPT_ACCESS_ANY, 0, "-h", "--help", \ WSH_SHELL_OPT_DESCR("Show command help information")

briefdescription.para: Define a built-in help option (e.g. "--help" or "-h").

memberdef.name: WSH_SHELL_OPT_INTERACT
memberdef.initializer: WSH_SHELL_OPTION_INTERACT, (acc), 0, "-i", "--interactive", \ WSH_SHELL_OPT_DESCR("Run command in interactive mode")

briefdescription.para: Define an option for entering interactive mode.
Define an option that requires no arguments.
Define an option that accepts multiple arguments.
Marks the end of an option array.

memberdef.name: WSH_SHELL_OPTION_TYPES_TABLE
memberdef.initializer: X_ENTRY(WSH_SHELL_OPTION_NO, "EMPTY") \ X_ENTRY(WSH_SHELL_OPTION_HELP, "HELP") \ X_ENTRY(WSH_SHELL_OPTION_INTERACT, "INTERACT") \ X_ENTRY(WSH_SHELL_OPTION_WO_PARAM, "WO_PARAM") \ X_ENTRY(WSH_SHELL_OPTION_MULTI_ARG, "MULTI_ARG") \ X_ENTRY(WSH_SHELL_OPTION_WAITS_INPUT, "WAITS_INPUT") \ X_ENTRY(WSH_SHELL_OPTION_STR, "STR") \ X_ENTRY(WSH_SHELL_OPTION_INT, "INT") \ X_ENTRY(WSH_SHELL_OPTION_FLOAT, "FLOAT") \ X_ENTRY(WSH_SHELL_OPTION_END, "END")

briefdescription.para: Internal macro: full list of option types.
Enumeration of all option types used by the shell.
Return the string name of an option type.
Definition of shell command-line option object and creation macros.

detaileddescription.para: This file provides structures and macros for defining and managing command-line options in the WSH shell framework.
